ygData.subject: Re: Warning about Accelerando
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Drooooooooool... ... Ugh.  I m having a hard enough time as it is navigating cities at my current rate of speed at L18.  I guess I ll have to start
ygData.messageBody:
On Thu, 3 Jun 1999, J.M. Capozzi wrote:
>
> At level 45 with a drum, I am a LOT faster than SoC cast by a 47th level
> Shaman. Ran a footrace in West Commons, from the Kithicor side. I was
> zoned before she got to the dervish camp, and SoC wore off before she made
> it across the zone.

Drooooooooool...

> It's a dead heat if I sing Accel and the shaman is using Cheetah. Not to

Ugh. I'm having a hard enough time as it is navigating cities
at my current rate of speed at L18. I guess I'll have to
start walking, or running without Accelerando just to keep my
sanity.

This also explains why we get safe fall - self preservation. :-)

--
John H. Kim
kim@...
